channel.title: Skiyo - Q&A
channel.description:
So i have decided to reopen this project, and get feedback from the community, so test it out, find bugs, and contribute to future updates but here it is.
Skiyo Q&A is a project i had going but stupidly i dropped it :/ however its back ! here it is.
[center][b][size=18pt]Features[/size][/b][/center]
[b][size=12pt]Feed[/size][/b]
[ul][li]AJAX Load news[/li] [li]Show news, if user answered question or changed status or changed avatar[/li][/ul]
[b][size=12pt]Search[/size][/b]
[ul][li]AJAX Search system[/li] [li]Search with parameters[/li] [li]AJAX Load more results[/li][/ul]
[b][size=12pt]User Setting's[/size][/b]
[ul][li]Edit city, name, surname, gender[/li] [li]Privacy settings[/li] [li]Design settings (upload background, set background color, background position)[/li] [li]Change password[/li] [li]Flash avatar upload[/li] [li]AJAX follow, unfollow[/li] [li]User’s followers/followings pages[/li][/ul]
[size=12pt][b]Profile pages[/b][/size]
[ul][li]Notifications about new questions[/li] [li]AJAX edit status[/li] [li]Show followers/followings[/li] [li]Delete avatar[/li] [li]Complaints(reports) on users with comment[/li] [li]Anonympusly/non anonymously questions[/li] [li]User answers[/li] [li]Verified Accounts[/li] [li]Show user is online or when last seen[/li][/ul]
[center][b][size=18pt]Screenshot's[/size][/b][/center] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2h6zw2b.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/154u42f.jpg[/img]
Give me your honest opinions and ask me questions @ http://skiyo.org/joshuac

item.title: Skiyo - Q&A
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I’ve been trying to avoid commenting on this for the reason that Not_a_bot stated above. Everyone seems to be absolutely in love with the design but it just looks like a Twitter remake in all honesty, alongside the fact that hosting one of these sites comes with ridiculous consequences if it goes viral, see: ask.fm. They’ve had to employ teams of lawyers to avoid law suits from people trying to sue because their kids have had abuse which ended in suicide. This really isn’t the kind of site anyone would like to make in all seriousness, I know I certainly wouldn’t want to be the man behind young teenagers getting depressed.

Read full topic
